metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Dreaming has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Dreaming has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Dorian,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
